mean_en: a former communist country in eastern Europe and northern Asia; established in 1922; included Russia and 14 other soviet socialist republics (Ukraine and Byelorussia an others); officially dissolved 31 December 1991
sentence: Russia is the largest country in the world, containing nine time zones.
sentence_trans: 俄罗斯是世界上最大的国家，横跨了九个时区！
